description: Derek has a very precious tree in the form of a Binary Search Tree and one of his enemies has put a virus in of the tree’s nodes. Later Derek after checking all the nodes gets to know that node with the value X has a got virus in it. Now , since he is already frustrated doing his bit till now, He asks for your help to return the new BST with the node having value X removed.
title: Delete a Node in BST
